lookup_subtitle: Completed a training? Enter your email to view results and download your certificate.
about_subtitle: A unified digital ecosystem to coordinate, monitor, and enhance the nation's disaster preparedness through a streamlined, data-driven process.
step_onboarding_desc: Agencies & NGOs register to standardize and manage training programs.
step_training_desc: Partners conduct disaster preparedness training across the nation.
step_monitor_desc: Real-time data is visualized on the national map to identify gaps.
step_assess_desc: Participants are assessed to generate readiness scores and certificates.
learn_subtitle: Knowledge is the key to resilience. Learn how to protect yourself and your community.
learn_card_flood_desc: Essential tips for preparing for and responding to floods.
learn_card_quake_desc: Learn the 'Drop, Cover, and Hold On' technique and more.
learn_card_firstaid_desc: Gain crucial first-aid skills to help in any emergency.
